text: "Love Me Do" is a 1962 song by The Beatles and backed by B-side P.S. I Love You. It was released in the United Kingdom in 1962 where it peaked at #17. It was released in the United States and peaked at #1 in the United States, Australia and New Zealand. == References == Category:1962 songs Category:1964 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:Ringo Starr songs Category:Paul McCartney songs Category:David Bowie songs
title: Love Me Do
